main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in Shreveport, Louisiana on August 22, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as silver and elliptical, with a height of 100-150 ft.,The flight pattern of the object was rapid and erratic,The sighting lasted for 45 seconds and included radar contacts before and after the visual sighting,There were two radar contacts before the visual sighting and one afterwards,The object disappeared in a westerly direction after about 60 seconds.
